divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my moms friends house and it was about 10PM. I was kicking a soccer ball back and fourth with my friend. I looked down to get the ball and I looked back up and there was 4 fireball looking ufo's with 3 in a triangle and 1 to the bottom left. It was moving real slow towered me. Earlier that night we saw 1 real far away. No one in that house had a clue what it was but we all saw it. I was in tears.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Capac
There were no other sightings in Capac on or around July 9th 2011
